text: here's another really delicious recipe
from our clean slate cookbook it's from

reenergize snack smart you never know
when hunger is going to strike so have

starting with four roasted red peppers
that have been seeded and peeled this

middle-eastern dip called muhammara
which is roasted red peppers walnuts

sieve half a cup of toasted walnuts
walnuts have that really great

we love also really nice texture and
flavor and half a teaspoon of red pepper
flakes going to add a nice amount of
heat good pinch of salt let's process

there and this will last for up to a

half the battle having things ready to

eNOS beautiful color the way I like to

we're just going to work on one half at

so you're working with quarters here all
you have to do is just very gently no
